Item ID1345

The adamant warhammer is a warhammer stronger than the mithril warhammer. Unlike other adamant weapons, it requires 30 Strength to wield. They are the fourth-strongest warhammers for all players. Players can make them using the Smithing skill at level 79 using 3 adamantite bars, giving the player 187.5 Smithing experience.

The adamant warhammer can be used as a substitute for a regular hammer when banging the big door at the entrance of Bandos' Stronghold in the God Wars Dungeon.

An adamant warhammer is required for a medium clue emote step.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The weapon's position on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

21 April 2021
(update)
  • Adamant warhammers now require level 30 Strength to wield instead of level 30 Attack.
  • The adamant warhammer's strength bonus was increased from 31 to 39.
10 December 2014
(update)

The item was renamed from "Addy warhammer" to "Adamant warhammer".

2 May 2006
(update)

The item was renamed from "Adamnt warhammer" to "Addy warhammer".

29 March 2004
(update)

The item became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

1 December 2003
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The adamant warhammer was previously named "Adamnt warhammer" in-game due to the name exceeding the previous game code limitations.

[[File:Adamant warhammer detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''adamant warhammer''' is a [[warhammer]] stronger than the [[mithril warhammer]]. Unlike other [[adamant weapons]], it requires 30 [[Strength]] to wield. They are the fourth-strongest warhammers for all players. Players can make them using the [[Smithing]] [[skill]] at level 79 using 3 [[adamantite bar]]s, giving the player 187.5 Smithing [[experience]].

The adamant warhammer can be used as a substitute for a regular [[hammer]] when banging the big door at the entrance of [[Bandos' Stronghold]] in the [[God Wars Dungeon]].

An adamant warhammer is required for a medium clue emote step.
